ProjectTitle: Interactions between river-geomorphology, carbon transport and floodplain carbon sequestration.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 15/04/2024 [REDACTED] [REDACTED] you collect and analyse samples yourself? if so please also add the samples/materials that you will use, these are considered physical data in the context of a DMP, how will you document, store, preserve and/or share these? [REDACTED] you mention no factors restricting sharing of data, why are you sharing data as restricted data and not as open data on RDR? [REDACTED] note that RDR will give your data a PID, a DIO, and that you can also give others access via RDR, which is more secure than using freeware. [REDACTED] more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
